attributes.action: Make orangutan habitats in the uk and plant loads of trees
attributes.additional_details: Orangutan need to be saved and stop palm oil

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "make orangutan habitats in the UK". The orangutan's natural habitat is tropical rainforest.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for the Government to plant five million trees and this petition which calls for a ban on palm oil instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258789

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259797
